Description: Bronze figure of Amun-Ra in a seated position(the throne is missing); the top of the plumes are corroded; the hand originally held a staff or sceptre; plinth beneath the feet with a tang below.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015-2016 4 Dec-27 Mar, Korea, Seoul Arts Centre, Human Image 2021 - 2022 27 Apr – 16 Jan, Madrid, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2022 16 Feb – 29 May, Seville, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2022 28 Jun - 9 Oct, Zaragoza, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2022 -2023 22 Nov - 9 Apr, Palma, Caixa Forum, “Human Image” 2023 4 July - 22 Oct, Barcelona, Caixa Forum, “Human Image”
Condition: fair - damage to the top of the plumes and right arm
